title: Media Buyer / Ad Scheduler
job_overview:
We have a small team of Â±7 freelancers mostly from Philipines but also some from Africa.

We are looking for someone that is able to launch Meta ads daily for about 2-3 hours per day.

Your tasks involves:
- Onboard on Slack
- Onboard on Trello --> Cards are generated with a Google Drive url with the creatives you have to schedule 
- Schedule the ads on Facebook (new campaign or add to existing campaign) (We will teach you!)
- Mark the cards on Trello as "Scheduled"

You will get ChatGPT prompts to generate the Primary Texts on Facebook and you can learn from our other ads.

What do we consider important?
- Consistency! Schedule as many ads from Trello as possible every day
- Persistency - Making mistakes while scheduling = we lose money. Make sure to double check everything before hitting that "Publish" button :)
